1.name: Message Field Verification
1.description: Visually or manually verify data which was inserted manually by the user.

2.name: Payment Dual Control
2.description: Determine whether a specific user can update or perform a specific action on a payment message at a specific point in the workflow.

3.name: Profile Dual Control
3.description: Determine whether a specific user can update/create/delete a specific Profile

4.name: Alerts
4.description: Be notified over GPP GUI of important occurrences, for example, count and/or amount in a filter queue exceeds the values defined

5.name: Auto Feeder
5.description: Perform actions on a selected group of data records, such as transactions or profiles, one after another in sequence.

8.name: Favorites
8.description: Add specific queues or Customized queues to a user"s Favorites

9.name: Customized Queues
9.description: To group messages  by specific criteria
